entry.title: Sharing the Word | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 7 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: Sharing the Word | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 7 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 7 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Sharing the Word.” Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
(August 8 - August 14, 2020)
Reading: Ps. 119:105, Jer. 23:29, Heb. 1:1–3, 2 Tim. 3:14–17, 1 John 1:7–9, Eccles. 3:1, 2 Tim. 4:2
Memory Text: “ ‘So shall My word be that goes forth from My mouth; it shall not return to Me void, but it shall accomplish what I please, and it shall prosper in the thing for which I sent it’ ” (Isaiah 55:11, NKJV).
Sunday (Ryan Day) “Symbols of God’s Word” Monday (Jill Morikone) “The Creative Power of God’s Word” Tuesday (Kenny Shelton) “The Benefits of Studying God’s Word” Wednesday (John Lomacang) “Applying God’s Word” Thursday (Danny Shelton) “Sharing the Word”
🔴ONLINE SABBATH SCHOOL LESSON PDF https://absg.adventist.org/pdf.php?file=2020:3Q:SE:PDFs:EAQ320_07.pdf
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL WEBSITE: https://3abnsabbathschoolpanel.com/
🔗SABBATH SCHOOL PODCAST: https://3abn.org/ssp-podcast.html

media:group.media:title: “Mission Reports - ADRA & GR3“ - 3ABN Today (TDY200030)
media:group.media:description:
We are having reports from 2 great organizations reaching people around the world. David Canther and Malcolm Seheul from Global Rescue, Relief & Resilience will be sharing with us how opportunities for sharing the gospel message are vibrant in all circumstances. We will also have Michael Kruger, ADRA's President and Matthew Siliga giving a great report of how they have been working around the world before and during this Covid-19 Pandemic.

media:group.media:title: Darkness on Earth (Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
Live church sermon produced by 3ABN with Kenny Shelton. Christians don't have to fear when there is turmoil and darkness all around. Even though Satan is trying to lead you astray, God will make a way for you to escape your tribulation.
The walk of a Christian ought to be like Jesus walked. A live of self denial. The Bible says we should take up our cross daily. That is to say, we should humble ourselves just as Jesus did on Calvary. Maybe you've never done this before. Maybe you struggle with self denial. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Pastor Kenny Shelton.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
➡️SUBSCRIBE https://bit.ly/3ABN_Subscribe

entry.title: Unlimited Possibilities | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 6 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: Unlimited Possibilities | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 6 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 6 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Unlimited Possibilities.” Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
(August 1 - August 7, 2020)
Reading: 1 Cor. 12:12, Matt. 3:16–18, 1 Cor. 12:7, 1 Cor. 1:4–9, Matt. 25:14–30
Memory Text: “But one and the same Spirit works all these things, distributing to each one individually as He wills” (1 Corinthians 12:11, NKJV).
Sunday (Jill Morikone) “Differing Gifts: United in Service” Monday (John Dinzey) “God: The Giver of All Good Gifts” Tuesday (Kenny Shelton) “The Purpose of Spiritual Gifts” Wednesday (Ryan Day) “Discovering Your Gifts” Thursday (John Lomacang) “Growing Our Gifts”

entry.title: “Long Ago Stories that Matter Today“ - 3ABN Today (TDY200029)

media:group.media:title: “Long Ago Stories that Matter Today“ - 3ABN Today (TDY200029)
media:group.media:description:
Join us today for an incredible program. Jason Bradley will be interviewing Pastor Bradley and Maribel Booth. He and his wife will be sharing their testimony. Their Mission work around the world has inspired them to write bible storybooks. He will be sharing why these old-time stories are so relevant today.

entry.title: Spirit-Empowered Witnessing | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 5 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: Spirit-Empowered Witnessing | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 5 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 5 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Spirit-Empowered Witnessing”. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
(July 25 - July 31, 2020)
Reading: John 15:26, 27; Acts 2:41, 42; Acts 8:4; Heb. 4:12; Acts 17:33, 34; Acts 18:8
Memory Text: “And when they had prayed, the place where they were assembled together was shaken; and they were all filled with the Holy Spirit, and they spoke the word of God with boldness” (Acts 4:31, NKJV).
Sunday (John Lomacang) “Jesus and the Promise of the Holy Spirit” Monday (John Dinzey) “An Empowered Church” Tuesday (Ryan Day) “The Holy Spirit and Witnessing” Wednesday (Kenny Shelton) “The Holy Spirit, the Word, and Witnessing” Thursday (Jill Morikone) “The Life-Transforming Power of the Holy Spirit”

media:group.media:title: “Child Impact In Action“ - 3ABN Today (TDY200031)
media:group.media:description:
In Today’s program we have Yvonne Shelton interviewing Jim Rennie, CEO, and Josue Gelabert, Donor Relations Manager of Child Impact International. This organization is working really hard to impact the lives of children in India, Bangladesh, Myanmar and other countries. Child Impact is also working with deaf, blind, abandoned children in these areas. Its operation Child Rescue Program rescues trafficked girls from the slums in India. Join us today and learn more about how you can help change the lives of more children.
Learn more at: https://childimpact.org/
